attributes.action: Assist the US Congress in investigating and bringing to justice all those, including any British nationals, responsible for rendering prisoners to secret interrogation centres anywhere in the world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The US Congress has now begun the painful process of revealing what the Bush administration may have been secretly doing with the aid of certain other governments in denial of the basic human rights of rendered detainees. As part of its stated commitmment to an  ethical foreign policy the British Government should do everything it can to help to expose and end such illegal practices.
